nodes.text: Graff Teiras was an agent of the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. He was stationed in Callia's aboard the Cal Ambre, serving as chief lieutenant for Retter Lewis' pipeline for transporting defecting Imperial officers and bureaucrats. Teiras was in regular communication with the Alliance and was in charge of managing all movement along the pipeline. His cover was that of the story manager where his duties included dealing with shippers, sellers, dealers, and estates auction houses.
